PHRASE.LANG: Traje de barón administrador Lando Calrissian

This is the outfit of a professional gambler, entrepreneur, smuggler and a general. Yes, you'll feel like you can do just about anything when you don these duds. Who wouldn't feel like they can do anything when they're wearing a cape?[#Legal]

La tenue d'un joueur professionnel, entrepreneur, contrebandier et général. Oui, vous aurez l'impression de pouvoir pratiquement tout faire en revêtant cet habit. Qui ne s'en sentirait pas capable en portant une cape ?[#Legal]

Das ist das Outfit eines professionellen Glücksspielers, Unternehmers, Schmugglers und eines Generals. Ja, man hat das Gefühl, man kann in diesen Sachen alles erreichen. Wer würde nicht denken, dass er in einem Cape alles machen kann.[#Legal]

Questo è il costume di un giocatore d'azzardo professionista, imprenditore, contrabbandiere e generale. Sì, ti sentirai capace di qualsiasi cosa quando lo indosserai. Chi non si sente capace di qualsiasi cosa indossando una cappa?[#Legal]

Este es el traje de un jugador profesional, empresario, contrabandista y general. Sí, sentirás que puedes hacer casi todo cuando te pongas estos harapos. ¿Quién no siente que puede hacer cualquier cosa llevando una capa?[#Legal]

This is the outfit of a professional gambler, entrepreneur, smuggler and a general. Yes, you'll feel like you can do just about anything when you don these duds. Who wouldn't feel like they can do anything when they're wearing a cape?[#Legal]
